Class RubiksFitness

java.lang.Object
  ec.Fitness

All Implemented Interfaces:
ec.Prototype, ec.Setup, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class RubiksFitness
extends ec.simple.SimpleFitness

Specific fitness created for solve GP problems for solving rubik's cubes.

Author:
Ignacio Bona
